meanings.definition: To make or become a desert.
meanings.sent1: The lack of rain was desertifying the once lush land.
meanings.sent2: The ongoing drought is slowly desertifying the region.
meanings.sent3: The relentless sun seemed to be desertifying the picnic area.
meanings.sent4: The rapid urbanization was desertifying the natural beauty of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The unstoppable sandstorm was desertifying everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: The farmland was desertifying due to poor irrigation practices.
meanings.sent2: The ecosystem was desertifying as a result of climate change.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome felt like it was desertifying in the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: The once vibrant community was desertifying into a ghost town.
meanings.sent5: The old building was slowly desertifying into a crumbling ruin.
